name: fsdoom
description:
What does home mean to you?

fsdoom is a file management tool in the form of a Doom mod - spawned demons represent files in your home directory. Killing them will delete the files.

Win the game and find out what did your /home mean to you.

For your own safety, the game is distributed only as a source code and a Ubuntu 18.10 VirtualBox image :) If you really want to run it directly, keep in mind that this game will delete your files! You have been warned.

Based on psdoom-ng, which is based on Chocolate Doom, so there's not much of original code. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Made for Global Game Jam 2019 in Warsaw, Poland (Polyjam 2019).

The image includes a shareware Doom I WAD file. There are also custom levels made for psdoom - refer to its README in order to get access to them.

Source code on GitLab
